name: indexless-query-benchmarks
description: Benchmark typical queries on Trino+Iceberg, PostgreSQL, and ClickHouse without indexes
author: Damir Manapov

scripts.compose:up:postgres:16gb: docker compose -f compose/docker-compose.yml -f compose/docker-compose.16gb.yml up -d postgres
scripts.compose:up:clickhouse:16gb: docker compose -f compose/docker-compose.yml -f compose/docker-compose.16gb.yml up -d clickhouse
scripts.compose:up:trino:16gb: docker compose -f compose/docker-compose.yml -f compose/docker-compose.16gb.yml up -d trino
scripts.compose:up:postgres:32gb: docker compose -f compose/docker-compose.yml -f compose/docker-compose.32gb.yml up -d postgres
scripts.compose:up:clickhouse:32gb: docker compose -f compose/docker-compose.yml -f compose/docker-compose.32gb.yml up -d clickhouse
scripts.compose:up:trino:32gb: docker compose -f compose/docker-compose.yml -f compose/docker-compose.32gb.yml up -d trino
scripts.compose:up:postgres:64gb: docker compose -f compose/docker-compose.yml -f compose/docker-compose.64gb.yml up -d postgres
scripts.compose:up:clickhouse:64gb: docker compose -f compose/docker-compose.yml -f compose/docker-compose.64gb.yml up -d clickhouse
scripts.compose:up:trino:64gb: docker compose -f compose/docker-compose.yml -f compose/docker-compose.64gb.yml up -d trino
scripts.compose:up:minio-cluster: docker compose -f compose/docker-compose.yml -f compose/docker-compose.minio-cluster.yml up -d minio1 minio2 minio3 minio4
scripts.compose:up:trino:minio-cluster: docker compose -f compose/docker-compose.yml -f compose/docker-compose.minio-cluster.yml up -d trino
scripts.compose:up:trino:64gb:minio-cluster: docker compose -f compose/docker-compose.yml -f compose/docker-compose.64gb.yml -f compose/docker-compose.minio-cluster.yml up -d trino
scripts.compose:up:trino:remote-s3: docker compose -f compose/docker-compose.yml -f compose/docker-compose.remote-s3.yml up -d trino
scripts.compose:up:trino:64gb:remote-s3: docker compose -f compose/docker-compose.yml -f compose/docker-compose.64gb.yml -f compose/docker-compose.remote-s3.yml up -d trino
scripts.compose:up:trino:64gb:standalone-minio: docker compose -f compose/docker-compose.yml -f compose/docker-compose.64gb.yml -f compose/docker-compose.standalone-minio.yml up -d trino
